summary: Dream-haunting Freddy Krueger returns once again to prowl the nightmares of Springwood's last surviving teenager, and of a woman whose personal connection to Krueger may mean his doom.
cast: Robert Englund|Lisa Zane|Shon Greenblatt|Lezlie Deane|Ricky Dean Logan|Breckin Meyer|Yaphet Kotto|Tom Arnold|Roseanne Barr|Elinor Donahue|Johnny Depp|Cassandra Rachel Friel|David Dunard|Marilyn Rockafellow|Virginia Peters|Stella Hall|Lindsey Fields|Angelina Estrada|Peter Spellos|Tobe Sexton|Chason Schirmer|Michael McNab|Matthew Faison|Vic Watterson|Carlease Burke|Robert Shaye|Warren Barrington|Mel Scott-Thomas|Jonathan Mazer|Frank Catalano|Alice Cooper|Joshua Weisel
title: Pesadilla final: La muerte de Freddy
